entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
